title_en: SDG 4.1.2 : Completion rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)
title_ms: SDG 4.1.2 : Kadar tamat persekolahan (pendidikan rendah, pendidikan menengah rendah, pendidikan menegah atas)
description_en: Annual completion rate of education, with breakdowns by education level, sex and state
description_ms: Kadar tamat persekolahan tahunan, dengan pecahan mengikut peringkat pendidikan, jantina dan negeri

fields.name: education_level
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 3 education levels, primary education ('primary'), lower secondary education ('lower_secondary'), upper secondary education ('upper_secondary')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Satu daripada 3 peringkat pendidikan, pendidikan rendah ('primary'), pendidikan menengah rendah ('lower_secondary'), pendidikan menegah atas ('upper_secondary')

fields.name: sex
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either both sexes ('both'), male ('male') or female ('female')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada kedua-dua jantina ('both'), lelaki ('male') atau perempuan ('female')

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: rate
fields.description_en: [Float] Percentage (%) of the population of students who completed the last grade in a level of education
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Peratusan (%) pelajar yang menamatkan darjah terakhir untuk sesuatu peringkat pendidikan
